TypeSignature.Value: public class ResXResourceReader : IDisposable, System.Collections.IEnumerable, System.Resources.IResourceReader
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResXResourceReader extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.IDisposable, class System.Resources.IResourceReader
Public Class ResXResourceReader Implements IDisposable, IEnumerable, IResourceReader
public ref class ResXResourceReader : IDisposable, System::Collections::IEnumerable, System::Resources::IResourceReader
type ResXResourceReader = class interface IResourceReader interface IEnumerable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 列舉 XML 資源 (.resx) 檔和資料流，並讀取循序資源名稱/值組。

span.span: Enumerates XML resource (.resx) files and streams, and reads the sequential resource name and value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供的預設實作讀取的 XML 格式的資源資訊的介面。The class provides a default implementation of the interface that reads resource information in an XML format. 若要從二進位資源的格式讀取資源資訊，請使用類別。To read resource information from a binary resource format, use the class. 您使用類別來周遊的字典列舉值來列舉.resx 檔案中的資源 () 時所傳回方法。You use the class to enumerate resources in .resx files by traversing the dictionary enumerator () that is returned by the method. 呼叫所提供的方法前進到下一個資源，以及讀取的名稱和每個資源的.resx 檔案中的值。You call the methods provided by to advance to the next resource and to read the name and value of each resource in the .resx file. > [!NOTE] > 類別提供兩個列舉值。The class provides two enumerators. 方法會傳回物件; 我們建議您使用這個方法，來列舉資源。The method returns an object; we recommend that you use this method to enumerate resources. 方法會傳回明確介面實作物件; 我們不建議使用它。The method is an explicit interface implementation that returns an object; we do not recommend its use. 下列範例會使用方法，以取得物件，可用來列舉.resx 檔案中的資源。The following example uses the method to obtain an object that is used to enumerate the resources in a .resx file. 此範例也包含`CreateResourceFile`常式，它會建立必要的資源檔。The example includes a `CreateResourceFile` routine that creates the necessary resource file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/cs/resxresourcereader1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/vb/resxresourcereader1.vb#1)] 如果屬性是`true`，值屬性是物件而不是資源的值。If the property is `true`, the value of the property is a object rather than the resource value. 這可讓資源項目的註解可從屬性。This makes a resource item's comment available from the property. 下列範例會設定屬性設`true`並列舉.resx 檔案中的資源The following example sets the property to `true` and enumerates the resources in a .resx file, [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/cs/resxresourcereader2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/vb/resxresourcereader2.vb#2)] 如果已`true`，則列舉中的項目可以是：If is `true`, the items in the enumeration can be either: - 連同其資料的具名的資源。Named resources along with their data. 在此情況下，屬性是`null`。In this case, the property is `null`. - 名為資源，以及包含資源資料檔案的名稱。Named resources along with the name of the file that contains the resource data. 在此情況下，屬性會傳回提供資源，包括其檔案名稱的相關資訊的物件。In this case, the property returns a object that provides information about the resource, including its filename. 如果使用相對檔案名稱，您都應該設定屬性提供的參考點的相對檔案路徑。If relative file names are used, you should always set the property to provide a reference point for the relative file path. 如果您想從.resx 檔擷取具名的資源，而不是列舉其資源，您可以具現化物件並呼叫其`GetString`和`GetObject`方法。If you want to retrieve named resources from a .resx file rather than enumerating its resources, you can instantiate a object and call its `GetString` and `GetObject` methods. > [!NOTE] > 類別包含的連結要求和繼承要求套用到所有成員的類別層級。The class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫端或衍生的類別不具有完全信任權限時，會擲回例外狀況。A exception is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來逐一查看.resx 檔案中的資源。The following example demonstrates how to use a to iterate through the resources in a .resx file. 首先， `rsxr`檔案建立`items.resx`。First, the `rsxr` is created for the file `items.resx`. 下一步方法用來建立逐一查看資源，並對主控台顯示內容。Next, the method is used to create an to iterate through the resources and display the contents to the console. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/resxresourcereader.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/resxresourcereader.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/resxresourcereader.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BasePath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BasePath : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件中指定之相對檔案路徑的基底路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the base path for the relative file path specified in a object.

value.span: 路徑，如果在 物件中指定的相對檔案路徑之前加上該路徑，則該路徑會產生資源檔的絕對路徑。

span.span: A path that, if prepended to the relative file path specified in a object, yields an absolute path to a resource file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來解析相對檔案路徑參考指派給屬性物件。The property is used to resolve relative file path references that are assigned to the property of objects. 根據預設，其值是，並在所傳回的目前目錄的相對解析相對檔案路徑參考屬性。By default, its value is , and relative file path references are resolved in relationship to the current directory returned by the property. 開始列舉資源之前，您應該設定這個屬性。You should set this property before you begin enumerating resources. ## Examples 下列範例會建立為 XML 資源檔包含的 dog 品種的映像，也會建立指定用來建立資源的應用程式的字串資源。The following example creates an XML resource file that contains images of dog breeds, and also creates a string resource that specifies the application that created the resource. 物件用來儲存映像，而不是將本身的二進位映像儲存在資源檔的路徑。 objects are used to store the path to the images rather than storing the binary images themselves in the resource file. 範例會設定屬性，因此相對檔案路徑中的映像的檔案名稱會被解譯為名為 C:\data 的目錄的子目錄\\。The example sets the property so that the relative file paths in the images' file names are interpreted as subdirectories of a directory named C:\data\\. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.BasePath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.basepath/cs/basepathex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.BasePath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.basepath/vb/basepathex1.vb#1)] 請注意，您必須新增對 System.net.http 成功編譯專案的參考。Note that you must add a reference to System.Drawing.dll to compile the project successfully. 這個範例也需要必要的映像位於名為 C:\data\images\\。The example also requires that the necessary images exist in a directory named C:\data\images\\.

exception.span: 在設定作業中無法指定值，因為已經存取 XML 資源檔，而且正在使用中。

span.span: In a set operation, a value cannot be specified because the XML resource file has already been accessed and is in use.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
abstract member Close : unit -> unit override this.Close : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫可讓所使用的資源重新配置用於其他用途。Calling enables the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在主控台中，檔案的資源，並接著使用方法關閉讀取器，並釋放其資源供其他處理序。The following example displays the resources of a file to the console, and then uses the method to shut down the reader and to make its resources available for other processes. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/resxresourcereader.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/resxresourcereader.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/resxresourcereader.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以透過下列方式呼叫方法或方法。This method can be called by either the method or the method. 使用這個方法會叫用`disposing`參數設定為`true`。 invokes this method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 使用這個方法會叫用`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes this method with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱和。

span.span: For more information about and , see and .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator

summary.span: 傳回目前 物件的列舉程式。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for the current object.

returns.span: 目前 物件的列舉值。

span.span: An enumerator for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取 XML 資源 (.resx) 資料流或目前相關聯的字串中的名稱/值組物件。The method retrieves the name/value pairs in the XML resource (.resx) stream or string associated with the current object. 不過，如果屬性設定為`true`再呼叫，資源項目會擷取成物件。However, if the property is set to `true` before you call , the resource items are retrieved as objects. 在此情況下，會傳回資源的所有節點，不論類型為何。In this case, all resource nodes are returned regardless of type. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以取得物件，可用來列舉.resx 檔案中的資源。The following example uses the method to obtain an object that is used to enumerate the resources in a .resx file. 此範例也包含`CreateResourceFile`常式，它會建立必要的資源檔。The example includes a `CreateResourceFile` routine that creates the necessary resource file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/cs/resxresourcereader1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/vb/resxresourcereader1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator GetMetadataEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 提供字典列舉值，其可從目前的 XML 資源檔或資料流中擷取設計階段屬性。

span.span: Provides a dictionary enumerator that can retrieve the design-time properties from the current XML resource file or stream.

returns.span: 資源內中繼資料的列舉程式。

span.span: An enumerator for the metadata in a resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源會儲存為資源檔或資料流中的名稱/值組。Resources are stored as name/value pairs in a resource file or stream. 設計階段屬性，稱為中繼資料，會儲存在資源檔或資料流，以及執行階段資料資源。Design-time properties, which are called metadata, are stored in the resource file or stream along with runtime data resources. 方法會提供物件，可擷取中繼資料，從資源檔或相關聯的目前資料流物件。The method provides an object that can retrieve the metadata from the resource file or stream associated with the current object. 不過，如果屬性設定為`true`之前先呼叫，不擷取任何資源節點。However, if the property is set to `true` before you call , no resource nodes are retrieved. ## Examples 下列範例會使用來逐一查看 XML 資源檔中的中繼資料資源的方法。The following example uses the method to iterate through the metadata resources in an XML resource file. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分屬性。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/useresxdatanodes.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/useresxdatanodes.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/useresxdatanodes.vb#4)]

summary.span: 傳回目前 物件的列舉程式。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for the current object.

summary.span: 如需這個成員的描述，請參閱 方法。

span.span: For a description of this member, see the method.

returns.span: 列舉程式，其可逐一查看與目前 物件相關聯之 XML 資源 (.resx) 資料流或字串中的名稱/值組。

span.span: An enumerator that can iterate through the name/value pairs in the XML resource (.resx) stream or string associated with the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 若要列舉.resx 檔案中的資源，我們建議您呼叫方法，然後再呼叫`MoveNext`方法在傳回物件。To enumerate the resources in a .resx file, we recommend that you call the method, and then call the `MoveNext` method on the returned object.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

summary.span: 如需這個成員的描述，請參閱 方法。

span.span: For a description of this member, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseResXDataNodes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseResXDataNodes : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出讀取目前的 XML 資源檔或資料流時，是否會傳回 物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects are returned when reading the current XML resource file or stream.

value.span: 如果擷取資源資料節點，則為 ，但如果忽略資源資料節點，則為 。

span.span: if resource data nodes are retrieved; if resource data nodes are ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定之前列舉資源的屬性。You can set the property before you begin enumerating resources. 根據預設，其值是`false`。By default, its value is `false`. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉，並會顯示在 XML 檔案中的資源項目。The following example enumerates and displays resource items in an XML file. 一開始，設為`false`所發生的資源檔中顯示資料和中繼資料的項目。Initially, is set to `false` to show both data and metadata items as they occur in the resource file. 第二個列舉都設定為`true`如此做會傳回資源資料元素物件。The second enumeration has the set to `true` so that resource data elements are returned as objects. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/useresxdatanodes.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/useresxdatanodes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/useresxdatanodes.vb#2)] 範例所使用的 XML 資源檔包含 1 個資料節點和一個中繼資料節點。The resource XML file used by the example contains one data node and one metadata node. 若要使用上述的範例 XML 檔案，複製下列文字並將它儲存到名為 Resource1.resx 的檔案。To use the XML file with the previous example, copy the following text and save it to a file named Resource1.resx. ``` text/microsoft-resx 2.0 System.Resources.ResXResourceReader, System.Windows.Forms, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089 System.Resources.ResXResourceWriter, System.Windows.Forms, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089 Sample DATA value Sample METADATA value ```

exception.span: 在設定作業中，資源檔或資料流的列舉值已開啟。

span.span: In a set operation, the enumerator for the resource file or stream is already open.
